reg_pit.acttitle: Local Government Act and Taxation (Rural Area) Act
reg_pit.title: Regional District Tax Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 118/2018, effective June 15, 2018.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Relationship between tax rates for different property classes
bcl:section.bcl:text: For taxes imposed under section 806.1Â [regional district tax collection in electoral areas] of the Local Government Act, the relationships between tax rates, expressed as ratios of the rate on each property class to the rate on Class 1, must be as set out in the following Schedule:
